title: GitHub Student Developer Pack
description: Get access to the best developer tools for free. Includes GitHub Pro, Azure credits, Heroku credits, and many more premium tools and services.

title: JetBrains Student License
description: Free access to all JetBrains IDEs including IntelliJ IDEA, PyCharm, WebStorm, and more. Perfect for professional software development.

title: Microsoft Office 365
description: Free Office 365 for students including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, and 1TB of OneDrive cloud storage.

title: Amazon Prime Student
description: Get 6 months of Prime Student for free, then 50% off Prime. Enjoy fast, free delivery, exclusive deals, and Prime Video streaming.

title: Spotify Premium Student
description: Get Spotify Premium at half price. Enjoy ad-free music, offline listening, and unlimited skips.

title: Adobe Creative Cloud
description: Save over 60% on Creative Cloud All Apps. Access Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, and 20+ creative apps.

title: AutoDesk Student License
description: Free 1-year access to professional 3D design software including AutoCAD, Maya, 3ds Max, and more.

title: Apple Music Student
description: Get Apple Music at a discounted rate. Includes access to over 100 million songs ad-free and Apple TV+ for free.

title: YouTube Premium Student
description: Enjoy ad-free videos, background play, and YouTube Music Premium at a student discount.

title: Notion Education Plan
description: Free Notion Plus for students and educators. Unlimited file uploads, version history, and collaboration features.
